column1: Uchi////Having read rave reviews of the brussel sprouts and fried milk
column2: I was destined to order these the first time I went. And as soon as I took my first bite
column3: I'm pretty sure I shat myself a little bit
column4: because it was honestly the best brussel sprouts and dessert I've ever had in my life. Now I'm not sure what's exactly in the brussel sprouts
column6: they're fried (sans batter) and tossed in a mixture of fish sauce and chili sauce. As for the fried milk
column7: it almost tastes like they tickled a cow and then deep fried its sweet teat nectar and put it on a plate with crushed up corn flakes and a brick of chocolate ganache. A masterpiece so beautiful
column8: I seasoned each bite with my tears.
